thread.title: 'Koffee With Karan': Kangana Ranaut was asked which Khan she wants to work with. Her reply proves she is the 'Queen' of Bollywood
thread.title_full: 'Koffee With Karan': Kangana Ranaut was asked which Khan she wants to work with. Her reply proves she is the 'Queen' of Bollywood - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: 'Koffee With Karan': Kangana Ranaut was asked which Khan she wants to work with. Her reply proves she is the 'Queen' of Bollywood
text:
Kangana Ranaut on 'Koffee With Karan'. Pics/Star World India Twitter account 
Bollywood actors Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan graced the couch on 'Koffee With Karan' to promote their upcoming film 'Rangoon'. Kangana proved she is quite the firebrand with her fiery responses!
When asked by Karan Johar which Khan -- Shah Rukh, Salman or Aamir -- she wants to work with, Kangana Ranaut had an epic response!
Kangana Ranaut said, "None!"
Wondering why? The actress reasoned, "I don't want to work with anyone with whom I don't have an equal role."
Isn't she truly the 'Queen' of Bollywood?

'Koffee With Karan' host Karan Johar 
Kangana Ranaut also didn't leave any opportunity to troll Karan Johar on his own show!
Kangana Ranaut recalled how KJo made fun of her English on 'Koffee With Karan'. When asked who she thinks in the industry has given her unnecessary attitude, Kangana replied, "I think it is you, Karan!"
Kangana Ranaut went on to add, "In my biopic, you will play the Bollywood biggie who is very snooty and completely intolerant to outsiders and the flag-bearer of nepotism, the movie mafia."
Kangana Ranaut also mocked Karan Johar by pointing towards him when asked who had verbal diarrhoea.

Saif Ali Khan on 'Koffee With Karan' 
Meanwhile, Karan Johar revealed that Saif Ali Khan was first offered Fawad Khan's role in 'Kapoor and Sons' and the Nawab admitted that not accepting the part was a mistake.
Also read:  'Koffee With Karan': Saif Ali Khan admits to cheating on his partner!
